gcci.text: H100 supply tightens as foundry allocations shift toward enterprise clusters, pushing buyers toward alternative GPUs and long-term capex commitments.

gtpi.text: Token costs compress as API price wars intensify and model efficiency gains outpace pricing headwinds.

gagl.text: Grid strain accelerates nuclear baseload proposals for new GW-scale AI clusters to stabilize load and cut emissions.

aipi.text: Market consolidation and muted IPOs suggest sustainable growth while tempering bubble risks through tighter capital discipline.
